title: Fat and proud of it
creator_credit: CBS News and Wombat Productions, Inc.
brief_description: At a meeting of the National Association to Aid Fat Americans people discuss fat pride, fat liberation and some of the difficulties encountered in personal relationships. Featuring Mike Wallace of Sixty Minutes.
